newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: CRICKET-W.P. 157-2 AT TEA AGAINST FREE STATE.
newsitem.headline: CRICKET-W.P. 157-2 AT TEA AGAINST FREE STATE.

text.p: Western Province were 157 for two at tea on the opening day their four-day match at Springbok Park on Friday.
Western Province 157-2 (Jacques Kallis 77 not out, Sven Koenig 52)
